title: 97/686/EC: Commission Decision of 13 October 1997 recognizing that the production of certain quality wines produced in specified regions in Italy, by reason of their qualitative characteristics, is far from able to satisfy demand (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 13 October 1997 recognizing that the production of certain quality wines produced in specified regions in Italy, by reason of their qualitative characteristics, is far from able to satisfy demand (Only the Italian text is authentic) (97/686/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quality wines psr set out in the Annex hereto meet the conditions laid down in the second subparagraph of Article 6 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 822/87 subject to compliance, for all the quality wines psr of the same region, with the increase in area set out in the same Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 October 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 84, 27. 3. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 196, 24. 7. 1997, p. 10.
